title: Put this 3 Bedroom on your to-see list! You'll be glad you did!
posting_body: ['RENT:', '$1921/Month |', 'SIZE:', '1335 sq ft |', 'BEDROOMS:', '3 |', 'BATHROOMS:', '2', 'LEASE TERMS:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'ABOUT COMMUNITY:', 'Work out in our newly revamped fitness center or simply relax by the pool.', 'You can also play a game of tennis at our tennis courts, or update your social media status in our business center.', 'We invite you to call us for more information or come by and see why our residents choose to call Brookside Park home!', 'We look forward to showing you around our community.', 'Pet Policy: Brookside Park Apartments is a pet friendly community that welcome two pets per apartment home.', 'The pet fee is $300 non-refundable per pet.', 'There is a $15 monthly pet fee.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions may apply.', 'UNIT
